verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We speak hope to the hopeless
Freedom to captives
In the name of the Father and Son
We speak healing to heartbreak
Peace to the restless
Your salvation has come
Arise and shine
Come out of the darkness
Walk out of your chains
Arise and shine
Come and give Him worship
Glorify His name
We speak life to the desert
And death to our bondage
In the name of the Father and Son
We speak power in weakness
This is our witness
That our Saviour has won
This is the sound of a people
Coming awake coming awake
This is the sound of a people
Shouting Your praise shouting Your praise
